subject: Re: [junit] Hos to use a JUnit 4 listener in maven-surefire-plugin
msgSnippet: Sudarshen, I m sorry you never got a response to this.  Did you find an answer? David Saff
messageBody:
Sudarshen,

I'm sorry you never got a response to this. Did you find an answer?

David Saff

On Tue, Sep 2, 2008 at 3:40 AM, sudarshenek <sudarshenek@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> In my maven pom.xml I want to register a JUnit 4.X listener to maven-
> surefire-plugin to notify that my all jUnit 4.X testcases completed
> their executions. TestNG provide this facility, but its prohibited here
> to use TestNG.
>
> Sudarshen
>
>
